description:
Long shorts for long days on the trail. These breathable shorts suit summer shredding. The fabric is light and stretchy, giving good coverage down to your kneepads. And there's 2 zippered pockets to keep your keys secure.Breathable nylon, spandex fabric adds airflow on warmer rides.Articulated fit helps reduce chafing.Elastic waistband sits comfortably under a pack waistbelt.2 zippered thigh pockets and 1 snap hip pocket.Length and leg opening cover the tops of most kneepads.

        Sustainability






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade














                      Recycled content
name: Patagonia Landfarer Bike Shorts - Men's
